author: simonetripodi
msg: added missing @since tag in isFrozen() method javadoc

author: hwright
msg: Merge r1164535, r1164554 from trunk:
Fix issue #4004 ("'svn patch --reverse-diff' chokes on patches
which add files with props").
Justification:
Prevents failure from a use-case that folks will naturally expect
to work: "svn diff > PATCH && svn patch PATH --reverse-diff"
Notes:
r1164535 adds the XFail regression tests.
r1164554 fixes the bug and expects test passage.
Merge this with --accept=mine-conflict, and then manually remove
the @XFail() line from the patch_tests.py:patch_reversed_add_with_props()
function.
Only one of (r1164517, r1164580) and (r1164535, r1164554) will conflict.
Votes:
+1: cmpilato, philip, stsp

author: hwright
msg: Merge r1164517, r1164580 from trunk, resolving conflicts as below:
Fix issue #4003 ("'svn patch' seems unable to delete properties").
Justification:
This fixes a lack of consistency with how emptied file contents
are handled.
Notes:
r1164517 adds the XFail regression test.
r1164580 fixes the bug and expects test passage.
Merge this with --accept=mine-conflict, and then manually remove
the @XFail() line from the patch_tests.py:patch_deletes_prop()
function.
Only one of (r1164517, r1164580) and (r1164535, r1164554) will conflict.
Votes:
+1: cmpilato, philip, stsp
